components.name: ButtonComponent

inputsClass.name: ariaPressed
inputsClass.rawdescription: ARIA pressed state for toggle buttons

inputsClass.name: fullWidth
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether the button should take full width
inputsClass.description: Whether the button should take full width

inputsClass.name: hideTextOnLoading
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether to hide text content when loading
inputsClass.description: Whether to hide text content when loading

inputsClass.name: loading
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether the button is in loading state
inputsClass.description: Whether the button is in loading state

inputsClass.name: rounded
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether the button has rounded corners

inputsClass.name: square
inputsClass.rawdescription: Whether the button has no border radius
inputsClass.description: Whether the button has no border radius

methodsClass.name: handleClick
methodsClass.rawdescription:
Handles button click events.
Prevents action if button is disabled or loading.
methodsClass.description: Handles button click events. Prevents action if button is disabled or loading.

components.description:
A customizable button component with multiple variants, sizes, and states.

Example :
```html
<qk-button variant="primary" size="lg" (clicked)="handleClick()">
  Click me
</qk-button>
Example :
components.rawdescription:
A customizable button component with multiple variants, sizes, and states.

```html
```html
<qk-button variant="primary" size="lg" (clicked)="handleClick()">
  Click me
</qk-button>
```
```

getSignature.rawdescription: Computes the CSS classes for the button based on current state and properties.

variables.name: AssistChip
BottomPosition
variables.defaultValue:
{ args: { text: 'Tooltip positioned on bottom', position: 'bottom', trigger: 'hover' }, render: (args) => ({ props: args, template: `
` }) }

variables.name: Default
variables.defaultValue:
{ args: { text: 'This is a simple tooltip', position: 'top', trigger: 'hover' }, render: (args) => ({ props: args, template: `
` }) }

variables.name: Disabled
variables.defaultValue:
{ args: { text: 'This tooltip is disabled', position: 'top', trigger: 'hover', disabled: true }, render: (args) => ({ props: args, template: `
` }) }

variables.name: Disabled
FilterChip
variables.defaultValue:
{
  args: {
    variant: 'filter',
    size: 'md',
    elevation: 'flat',
    selected: false
  },
  render: (args) => ({
    props: args,
    template: `<qk-chip 
      [variant]="variant" 
      [size]="size" 
      [elevation]="elevation"
      [selected]="selected"
      [disabled]="disabled"
      (clicked)="clicked($event)"
      (selectionChange)="selectionChange($event)">
      Filter Chip
    </qk-chip>`
  })
}

variables.name: InputChip
variables.defaultValue:
{
  args: {
    variant: 'input',
    size: 'md',
    elevation: 'flat',
    removable: true
  },
  render: (args) => ({
    props: args,
    template: `<qk-chip 
      [variant]="variant" 
      [size]="size" 
      [elevation]="elevation"
      [removable]="removable"
      [disabled]="disabled"
      (clicked)="clicked($event)"
      (removed)="removed($event)">
      Input Chip
    </qk-chip>`
  })
}
